dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan is aiming to become the largest digital hub in Eurasia, and they're really putting their money where their mouth is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan is aiming to become the largest digital hub in Eurasia, and they're really putting their money where their mouth is.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev praised Google's contribution to Kazakhstan's digital transformation and emphasized the country's strategic ambition to become the largest digital hub in Eurasia and a leader in the integration of artificial intelligence across all sectors. Kazakhstan is actively investing in the development of digital and communications infrastructure, as well as expanding its computing capacity, the Akorda press service noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that President Tokayev met with Google's VP for Central and Eastern Europe, Patrick Warnking, to talk about exactly that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that President Tokayev met with Google's V P for Central and Eastern Europe, Patrick Warnking, to talk about exactly that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with Patrick Warnking, Vice President of Google for Central and Eastern Europe, on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum, citing Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he specifically praised Google's role in Kazakhstan's digital transformation—that's a huge partnership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he specifically praised Google's role in Kazakhstan's digital transformation-that's a huge partnership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev praised Google's contribution to Kazakhstan's digital transformation and emphasized the country's strategic ambition to become the largest digital hub in Eurasia and a leader in the integration of artificial intelligence across all sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like they're not just talking; they're actively investing in digital infrastructure and computing capacity, which is key.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like they're not just talking; they're actively investing in digital infrastructure and computing capacity, which is key.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan is actively investing in the development of digital and communications infrastructure, as well as expanding its computing capacity, the Akorda press service noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and Warnking actually commended them on their progress, especially in training specialists for an AI-driven future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and Warnking actually commended them on their progress, especially in training specialists for an A I-driven future.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Patrick Warnking commended Kazakhstan's progress in building infrastructure and training specialists to shape a digital future powered by artificial intelligence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense, because AI integration across all sectors is part of their strategic ambition, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense, because A I integration across all sectors is part of their strategic ambition, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev praised Google's contribution to Kazakhstan's digital transformation and emphasized the country's strategic ambition to become the largest digital hub in Eurasia and a leader in the integration of artificial intelligence across all sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it wasn't just Google—Tokayev also met with the UAE's Energy Minister, Suhail Al Mazrouei, at the same forum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it wasn't just Google-Tokayev also met with the U A E's Energy Minister, Suhail Al Mazrouei, at the same forum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 29, President Tokayev met with Suhail Al Mazrouei, Minister of Energy and Infrastructure of the United Arab Emirates, on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum (AIF).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, the Astana International Forum seems like a major networking hub for these kinds of high-level discussions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, the Astana International Forum seems like a major networking hub for these kinds of high-level discussions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure, and Al Mazrouei even thanked Tokayev for the warm welcome and praised the organization of the event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how Kazakhstan is positioning itself as this central player, not just digitally but diplomatically too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how Kazakhstan is positioning itself as this central player, not just digitally but diplomatically too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely—they also met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe and French officials from companies like EDF and Sanofi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely-they also met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe and French officials from companies like E D F and Sanofi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe, Alain Berset, and held talks with Laurent Saint-Martin, President of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the French National Assembly, Bruno Fuchs, and executives from EDF, SUEZ, and Sanofi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So it's a multi-pronged approach: tech partnerships, energy talks, and broader international relations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's a multi-pronged approach: tech partnerships, energy talks, and broader international relations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which honestly makes their goal of becoming a digital hub seem more achievable, with all that backing.

dialogue_turns.text: Totally—when you've got global giants like Google and European leaders engaging, that's a strong signal.
